title: Rotes Haus (Tell Schech Hamad)
description: The so-called "Red House" is a large building at DÅ«r-Katlimmu that was built and occupied between the sixth and fifth centuries BCE. The structure included administrative, reception, and living areas, and a few Assyrian cuneiform texts were recovered during its excavation.

properties.description: Location of the earlier "lower city" settlement as determined in Google Earth with reference to annotated oblique aerial image published at schechhamad.de.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Rotes Haus
